amendment.description: Amendment allows the Secretary of Transportation to waive the repayment of Federal funds expended on the construction of high occupancy lanes or auxiliary lanes on I-287 in the State of New Jersey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to waive repayment of funds expended on the construction of high occupancy lanes on I-287 in the State of New Jersey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roukema amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
